text:
Unidentified persons broke into the house of three persons at different places in the city and decamped with about 700 gm of gold jewellery, and 5 kg of silverwares on Wednesday.

The incidents took place when the house owners were away.

Kanagaraj (74) of Alagapuram lost about 560 gm of gold jewellery, and 4 kg silverwares.

Lilly Prema (57) of Suramangalam lost about 140 gm of gold jewellery. Ramasundaram (65) of Meyyanur lost Rs. 15,000, and 1 kg silverwares.
title: Three houses burgled
